PARAMETER.NAME: SCHEMA
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: OPERATION_ON=='OP_TABLE' AND (OPERATION=='CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE')

PARAMETER.NAME: PRINCIPAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_KEYTAB =='true' AND USE_KRB=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: KEYTAB_PATH
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_KEYTAB =='true' AND USE_KRB=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: CREATE_TABLE_IF_NOT_EXIST
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((OPERATION_ON=='OP_TABLE') AND (OPERATION=='CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE'))

PARAMETER.NAME: OPTION
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((OPERATION_ON=='OP_DATABASE') AND (OPERATION=='DROP' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE'))

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_USER_GROUP
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((OPERATION_ON=='OP_DATABASE' OR OPERATION_ON=='OP_TABLE' OR OPERATION_ON=='OP_PARTITION') AND (OPERATION=='DROP' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE'))

PARAMETER.NAME: USER_GROUP
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (SET_USER_GROUP=='true' AND (OPERATION_ON=='OP_DATABASE' OR OPERATION_ON=='OP_TABLE' OR OPERATION_ON=='OP_PARTITION') AND (OPERATION=='DROP' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE'))

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_PERMISSIONS
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((OPERATION_ON=='OP_DATABASE' OR OPERATION_ON=='OP_TABLE' OR OPERATION_ON=='OP_PARTITION') AND (OPERATION=='DROP' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE'))

PARAMETER.NAME: PERMISSIONS
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((OPERATION_ON=='OP_DATABASE' OR OPERATION_ON=='OP_TABLE' OR OPERATION_ON=='OP_PARTITION') AND (OPERATION=='DROP' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE') AND SET_PERMISSIONS=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: DB_LOCATION
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (OPERATION_ON=='OP_DATABASE' AND (OPERATION=='CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE'))

PARAMETER.NAME: DB_DESCRIPTION
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (OPERATION_ON=='OP_DATABASE' AND (OPERATION=='CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE'))

PARAMETER.NAME: TABLE_NAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (OPERATION_ON=='OP_TABLE' OR OPERATION_ON=='OP_PARTITION')

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_FILE_LOCATION
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((OPERATION_ON=='OP_PARTITION') AND (OPERATION=='CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE'))

PARAMETER.NAME: FILE_LOCATION
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((OPERATION_ON=='OP_PARTITION') AND (OPERATION=='CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE') AND SET_FILE_LOCATION=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: CREATE_EXTERNAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((OPERATION_ON=='OP_TABLE') AND (OPERATION=='CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE'))

PARAMETER.NAME: STORAGE_FORMAT
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((OPERATION_ON=='OP_TABLE') AND (OPERATION=='CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE'))

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_PARTITIONS
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((OPERATION_ON=='OP_TABLE') AND (OPERATION=='CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE'))

PARAMETER.NAME: SCHEMA_PARTITION
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: OPERATION_ON=='OP_TABLE' AND (OPERATION=='CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE') AND SET_PARTITIONS=='true'

PARAMETER.NAME: TABLE_COMMENT
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((OPERATION_ON=='OP_TABLE') AND (OPERATION=='CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE'))

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_HDFS_LOCATION
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((OPERATION_ON=='OP_TABLE') AND (OPERATION=='CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE'))

PARAMETER.NAME: HDFS_LOCATION
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((OPERATION_ON=='OP_TABLE') AND (OPERATION=='CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE') AND SET_HDFS_LOCATION=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_ROW_FORMAT
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((OPERATION_ON=='OP_TABLE') AND (OPERATION=='CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE'))

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_FIELD_TERMINATED_BY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((OPERATION_ON=='OP_TABLE') AND (OPERATION=='CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE') AND SET_ROW_FORMAT=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: FIELD_TERMINATED_BY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (SET_FIELD_TERMINATED_BY=='true' AND (OPERATION_ON=='OP_TABLE') AND (OPERATION=='CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE') AND SET_ROW_FORMAT=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_COLLECTION_ITEM_TERMINATED_BY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((OPERATION_ON=='OP_TABLE') AND (OPERATION=='CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE') AND SET_ROW_FORMAT=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: COLLECTION_ITEM_TERMINATED_BY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (SET_COLLECTION_ITEM_TERMINATED_BY=='true' AND (OPERATION_ON=='OP_TABLE') AND (OPERATION=='CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE') AND SET_ROW_FORMAT=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_MAP_KEY_TERMINATED_BY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((OPERATION_ON=='OP_TABLE') AND (OPERATION=='CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE') AND SET_ROW_FORMAT=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: MAP_KEY_TERMINATED_BY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (SET_MAP_KEY_TERMINATED_BY=='true' AND (OPERATION_ON=='OP_TABLE') AND (OPERATION=='CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE') AND SET_ROW_FORMAT=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_LINES_TERMINATED_BY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((OPERATION_ON=='OP_TABLE') AND (OPERATION=='CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE') AND SET_ROW_FORMAT=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: LINES_TERMINATED_BY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (SET_LINES_TERMINATED_BY=='true' AND (OPERATION_ON=='OP_TABLE') AND (OPERATION=='CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE') AND SET_ROW_FORMAT=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: TEMPLETON_PROPERTIES
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((OPERATION_ON=='OP_DATABASE' OR OPERATION_ON=='OP_TABLE') AND (OPERATION=='CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_CREATE' OR OPERATION=='DROP_IF_EXIST_CREATE'))
